items.title: Stocks To Watch: HDFC Bank, Muthoot Finance, Ola Electric, Adani Green, LIC

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty, weak global cues signal likely slower open for Sensex, Nifty
items.description: Share Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty futures, trading around 50 points lower, signalled a slower open for markets in India on Friday.

items.title: GQG Partners' Rajiv Jain unimpressed by China stock mania sweeping globe
items.description: The manager of the top-performing $23 billion GQG Partners Emerging Markets Equity Fund has kept his holdings in Chinese stocks at about 12 per cent

items.title: DMart share falls 4% despite strong Q2 business update; adds 377 stores
items.description: DMart share price fell despite the company posting a strong set of quarterly updates for  Q2FY25 (July 2024 - September 2024).

items.title: Diffusion Engineers lists 15% higher over IPO price on NSE; misses GMP hype

items.title: UFlex up 4% as arm to set up aseptic packaging unit in Egypt for $126 mn
items.description: UFlex share price surged after the company announced that its  step down wholly owned subsidiary, Flex Asepto (Egypt) SAE, has decided to set up an Aseptic Packaging facility in Egypt.
